thread.section_title: OnDeck Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of OnDeck | ondeck.com
thread.title: Richard Grabow

author: Richard Grabow
title: Richard Grabow
text:
This is very early in our relationship; but my experience with OnDeck to date has been excellent. They have been totally upfront about everything, and the application process is simple, straight forward and quick. Funding occurred within a few hours of approval which exceeded my expectations.
Interest rates are high, but they're taking risk and deserve a good return. I expect my loan cost/rates will come down with time and my good performance.
